BackstoryDef.title: animal lover
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was said to have been raised by wild deer. Because of this affinity with nature, [PAWN_nameDef] always seemed to attract the company of animals, and spent many an hour playing whimsical folk songs for the forest. [PAWN_pronoun] was proficient in playing both the panpipes and the lyre.

BackstoryDef.title: navigator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a crew of oceanic spelunkers, sailing from shore-to-shore in pursuit of rare treasures. [PAWN_nameDef] wasn’t just a stellar navigator, but also a daring explorer, a fantastic swimmer and a surprisingly good cook.

BackstoryDef.title: lost child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never saw danger in the unknown, only adventure. This thrill-seeking and curious approach to life lead the young [PAWN_nameDef] into a volcanic forest, never to find [PAWN_possessive] way back home. A small family of wild Satyrs adopted [PAWN_objective], and taught [PAWN_objective] how to weave baskets, rope, clothes and weaponry from natural materials.

BackstoryDef.title: firework maker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] manufactured fireworks for spiritual and religious festivals. Being an alchemist of explosions taught [PAWN_objective] a surprising amount about firearms and other kinds explosives, especially the ones that killed.\n\nThe thrill of the bangs and booms of explosives never seemed to get old for [PAWN_nameDef].

BackstoryDef.title: palaeontologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s passion in palaeontology was propelled by [PAWN_possessive] in satyrs. [PAWN_pronoun] is determined to uncover the origins of the satyr, and find evidence to suggest when they first began to inhabit the Rim. [PAWN_pronoun] underwent this mission alone, and learned a hefty amount about geology and geochronology along the way.

BackstoryDef.title: marine biologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Deep within the clutches of the oceanic trenches, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] crew harvested and performed tests on the creatures that lurked there. The darkness and isolation of being so far away from home somewhat comforted [PAWN_nameDef], for nobody was to know of [PAWN_possessive] sick, cannibalistic tendencies down there…

BackstoryDef.title: stargazer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_objective]self in the night sky, dreaming of a horned, starry-eyed race of xenos [PAWN_pronoun] had read about in fairytales. [PAWN_pronoun] charted the stars for [PAWN_possessive] tribe, and told stories of their beauty and splendour.

BackstoryDef.title: potter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] created ceramic models of fauns in a communal, log-built studio nestled within the mountains. [PAWN_nameDef] made a meagre profit from [PAWN_possessive] crafts, despite [PAWN_possessive] talent. A dreadful, unsupervised kiln fire put an end to [PAWN_possessive] studio, and everything in it.
